review: Set up was easy as advertised AFTER I HAD TO GOOGLE HOW TO OPEN BATTERY COMPARTMENT ON REMOTE.  That's the best design you could come up with?
author: David L. Molnar

review: Love it, watch all the movies you want for $100 bucks and free shipping.
author: Joe B.

review: Great device and easy to use. I have Apple TV on one TV and the Fire TV Stick and love both but the Fire Stick is much easier to use for travel.
author: Larry A. Carver "Cal"

review: It was easy to install. There was a short and clear tutorial on what you can do with it. I started using it right away. Now I don't have to connect my laptop to my TV when I want to watch movies on a bigger screen.
author: Kabaam

review: The Fire TV Stick is an amazing & easy way to stream videos from Amazon Prime.  It's very easy to set up, too!
author: K. Zakrzewski

review: Awesome product, kids love it, thanks so much!
author: Derek

review: Not as good as the Roku 3 I bought.
author: ron
